trans:
It has resulted in the gradual observation of a change. This mentioned tradition...
The spatial arrangement, whether in Western Europe or the Middle East, is present everywhere.
It is closely associated with the fundamental fabric of feudal cities. In the feudal city,
Urban activities are classified in the following way, reflecting on the space:
It can be said that urban management and control activities, and the activities of this function...
The central area where it is concentrated in the hierarchy. Right next to it in this hierarchy...
the commercial, artisan, and, if present, port activities concentrated in the business district. Especially...
the port, both for other industries and the controlling administrative area’s...
is a center that determines its place in the space. c) The residential areas that follow these...
areas, and finally, the minority groups, those outside the system, and some economic...
activities are located in the surrounding (periphery). The traditional...
society is based on limited division of labor, organic energy, and primitive technology.
economic life and its associated stratification are also reflected in urban areas.
